name: Pocket Drops
description:
From the masters of liquid who brought you Pocket Pond comes a brand new visual masterpiece!

Bounce, chop, combine, and play with the jelly-like drops. Relax in a zen atmosphere or slice them up with a satisfying POP!

Try to get the highest combo!!

- FEATURES -

* Beautifully rendered, fully interactive soft liquid
* Multiple backgrounds
* Immersive soundscape (use headphones for best experience)
* Full SPH simulation for realistic drop popping!

Upgrade to Chop the Drop to add the following features:
* 20 new backgrounds
* 10 new shapes
* Dozens of challenging levels
* Unlock a cup to hold the popped liquid and play with it!
* Game Center leaderboards and achievements
